UniprotID	P40225-2
Accession	P40225;A1L3Y0;B7ZLR8;B9EGA8;Q13020;Q15790;Q15791;Q15792
EntryName	TPO_HUMAN
ProteinName	Thrombopoietin (C-mpl ligand) (ML) (Megakaryocyte colony-stimulating factor) (Megakaryocyte growth and development factor) (MGDF) (Myeloproliferative leukemia virus oncogene ligand)
GeneName	THPO MGDF
Length	349
Function	Lineage-specific cytokine affecting the proliferation and maturation of megakaryocytes from their committed progenitor cells. It acts at a late stage of megakaryocyte development. It may be the major physiological regulator of circulating platelets.
Subcellular Location	Secreted
Disorder
